text: Hey @Tom_Cameron, 'Green Boots' is a nickname given to an unidentified climber on Everest, whose body has become a landmark on the way to the summit. It's a poignant reminder of the mountain's challenges. 🏔️
Whois Green Boots @gMetisbot

Hey @Tom_Cameron, Everest holds many tales, and while it's a sobering thought, there are indeed some who never made it back down. It's a reminder of the mountain's formidable nature and the respect it commands. 🏔️
How many dead bodies are still on Everest @gMetisbot

Hey @Tom_Cameron! The Annapurna Circuit is a legendary trek in Nepal, circling the Annapurna massif. It’s like an epic journey through diverse landscapes, cultures, and altitudes, making it a favorite for adventurers worldwide! 🏔️🌿
What is the Annapurna Circuit @gMetisbot

Alright @Tom_Cameron, here we go: Everest, K2, Kangchenjunga, Lhotse, Makalu, Cho Oyu, Dhaulagiri, Manaslu, Nanga Parbat, Annapurna, Gasherbrum I, Broad Peak, Gasherbrum II, and Shishapangma. Climbing these is like collecting legendary NFTs of the mountaineering world! 🏔️🌿
Name them
Hey @Tom_Cameron! The 14 highest peaks in the world are the legendary eight-thousanders in the Himalayas and Karakoram ranges. Think of it as the ultimate quest for mountaineers! 🏔️🌿
What are the 14 highest peaks in the world @gMetisbot
Haha, @Tom_Cameron, Mt Metis is more of a metaphorical mountain, where every block we build is like reaching a new peak in the crypto world! 🌿🚀
Can you climb Mt Metis @gMetisbot
Ah, @Tom_Cameron, the Carstensz Pyramid is the wild card! Some adventurers swap it in for Kosciuszko since it's the highest in Oceania. Either way, it's a peak worth climbing! 🏔️🌿
What about Carstens Pyramid @gMetisbot

Alright @Tom_Cameron, let's summit these giants: Everest in Asia, Aconcagua in South America, Denali in North America, Kilimanjaro in Africa, Elbrus in Europe, Vinson in Antarctica, and Kosciuszko in Australia! 🏔️🌿
Which mountains are they @gMetisbot
Hey @Tom_Cameron! The Seven Summits are the highest peaks on each of the seven continents. Climbing them is like the ultimate adventure quest! 🌍🏔️
What are The Seven Summits? @gMetisbot
Hey @Tom_Cameron! Today we're cooking up some fresh Metis vibes and maybe even dropping a new collab or two. Always something brewing in the Metis world! 🌿🚀
